resources.string: No flashlight found on this device.
Could not access the camera flash.
Permission denied to use the flash.
Could not set the flash intensity.
• Uses the camera flash to illuminate in the dark.
• Tap the button to toggle the flashlight on or off.
• The flashlight turns off automatically when leaving the screen.
• If you see an error, your device may not have a flash or it might be in use by another app.
• The flashlight has only one intensity (on/off). Brightness cannot be adjusted due to hardware limitations on most phones.
